Title: Book Store Service
Description:
This project contains source code for the 'Book Store' service (WCF OData Service) and includes Load Test project (via Visual Studio Tools) and extension to Cruise Control that enables you to run the Load Test continuously and track performance degradation.

The project includes the following features:
+ MSTest unit tests for all user scenarios
+ MSTest Load Test
+ LoadTestDbToXml application (used for Continuous Integration)
+ All the configuration files/xls files required to run the Load Test and display the results in Cruise Control .NET (Continuous Integration Server)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project contains source code for the 'Book Store' service (WCF OData Service) and includes Load Test project (via Visual Studio Tools) and extension to Cruise Control that enables you to run the Load Test continuously and track performance degradation.

The project includes the following features:
+ MSTest unit tests for all user scenarios
+ MSTest Load Test
+ LoadTestDbToXml application (used for Continuous Integration)
+ All the configuration files/xls files required to run the Load Test and display the results in Cruise Control .NET (Continuous Integration Server)

For more details, please see:
http://aviadezra.blogspot.com/2011/12/creating-load-test-using-visual-studio.html
http://aviadezra.blogspot.com/2011/12/continuous-integration-for-visual.html
http://aviadezra.blogspot.com/2012/01/tracking-performance-degradation-with.html

Your contribution is welcome!
